== The Tanzanian Community Ubuntu users ==

{{http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/6956/ubuntulogotzbeta.png}}

=== Introduction ===

Ubuntu Tanzania  is a local community team. We represent all the users of the different flavours of Ubuntu in our country.
Ubuntu - Tanzania

Ubuntu Tanzania  is a local community team. We represent all the users of the different flavours of Ubuntu in our country.

 
=== Goals ===

What we are planning on achieving:

*** Creating a foundation for extensive use of Ubuntu in the public, private and home sectors
*** Advocating and promoting the use of Free Software in WikiPedia:Tanzania with a special focus on Ubuntu
*** Conduct workshops to expose Tanzanians to free software through hands-on sessions
*** Coordinate and arrange translation of Ubuntu into Kiswahili
*** Act as a point of contact  for the Tanzanian Ubuntu users with the rest of the Ubuntu community,
*** Provide help and support for Ubuntu users through our howto's ,mailing list and Online Forum
*** Help people get Ubuntu on CD/DVD easily by downloading and sharing with them

 
=== How to be part of the Ubuntu Tanzania community ===

This group is for people of all technical background from I've-never-heard-of-linux all the way to I'm-an-Ubuntu-proffi.

There are many ways for you to participate in the new Tanzanian Ubuntu community.  Get detailed information

or simply by

*** Registering at our Online Forum
*** Subscribe to our mailing list
*** Come and chat in our IRC

=== Joining the Ubuntu Tanzania LoCo Core team ===

Although we welcome most of the new comers to join the core team, you will have to earn the trust of the existing core team members, Both the mailing list and IRC channel are used, but you are of course also welcome to contact me, [PeterHoeg], directly.

=== help us by ===

*** Providing technical know - how to new ubuntu users in the Forum
*** Contributing to our Projects
*** Advocating the use of Ubuntu to individuals and organisations alike.
